original_title: Al Stewart: The Best Of Musikladen, Live
overview: This performance by British singer/songwriter Al Stewart, originally recorded for broadcast on German television, has been given a simple presentation on DVD. Best of Musikladen: Al Stewart has been transferred to disc in its original full-frame aspect ratio of 1.33:1
tagline: Recorded live in in 1979 in Bremen (Radio Bremen studios), West Germany for the NDR-TV show, MusikLaden, formerly called the "Beat Club"
title: Al Stewart: The Best Of Musikladen, Live
